original_title: Cirque du Soleil: ZAIA Crossroads in Macau
overview: "ZAIA: Crossroads in Macau" is a documentary that demonstrates the concepts from which the first Cirque du Soleil show in Asia was created and how they were layered onto the real life challenges of its artists and creators.
title: Cirque du Soleil: ZAIA Crossroads in Macau
